verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In all the world there's never been a people
Nor will there ever be again
A mighty nation rising strong and noble
To see an age brought to an end.
Watch now as a people rise up to bring it on!
Chorus:
We are, we are a fire, led by our God's desire.
We are more than a conqueror, a nation silent no longer.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
A captive land has always been around us,
Ruled by the prince whose power is hate,
But a kindled spark has burst within us,
That can't be stopped, that cannot wait
Watch now as a people rise up to bring it on!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Burning hearts are joining in together
A force so strong all eyes will see
When the last of the captive kingdom
Is released from futility
Watch now as a people rise up to bring it on!
